description: Dashboard for spring boot 2 services. Displays standard spring metrics along with important data from kubernetes.

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method,path) (increase(http_requests_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))
sum by (service) (increase(http_requests_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))
targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method, path) (irate(http_requests_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) / sum by (method, path) (irate(http_requests_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))

panels.description: Actually, query works with 'outcome' attribute: [SUCCESS, CLIENT_ERROR, SERVER_ERROR]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status="2XX"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status="4XX"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls", status="5XX"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

panels.title: Response Status Groups 2xx / 4xx / 5xx [5m]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))
sum by (method, path, status) (increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status="4XX", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m]))
sum by (method, path, status) (increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status="5XX", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m]))

sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls", status!="2XX"}[5m])) by (method, path) / (sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (method, path) > 0)
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[$__range]) > 0) by (method, path))
sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[$__range]) > 0)
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", path!~"$excluded_urls"}[$__range]) > 0) by (status))
time () - process_start_time_seconds{namespace="$namespace", service="${app}-service", pod="$pod"}

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"deploy/$app.*", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod",container="replenishment-bff"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

sum (
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller=~"deploy/$app.*", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="replenishment-bff"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$app.*", pod=~"$pod"})
avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace", container=~"$app.*", pod=~"$pod"})
avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace", container="$app"})

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/replenishment-bff-deployment", pod=~"$pod"}[30m])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod",container="replenishment-bff"}[30m]))
) > 0

sum (
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/replenishment-bff-deployment", pod=~"$pod"}[30m])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container="replenishment-bff"}[30m]))
)
sum(increase(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace", status="503"}[5m])) by (service)
sum(increase(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace", status="503"}[5m]))
sum(increase(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace", status="499"}[5m])) by (service)
sum(increase(ingress_nginx_detail_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", namespace="$namespace", status="499"}[5m]))

sum by (method, path) (irate(http_requests_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", status="2XX", path=~"/(_readiness|_healthz)"}[5m]) / irate(http_requests_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", status="2XX", path=~"/(_readiness|_healthz)"}[5m]))
sum by (method, path, status, pod) (increase(http_requests_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="2XX", path=~"/(_readiness|_healthz)"}[5m]))

panels.title: Healthcheck Response Statuses 4xx/5xx by (method, path, status, pod) [5m]

targets.expr: irate(process_cpu_user_seconds_total{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"}[2m]) * 100
irate(process_cpu_system_seconds_total{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app."}[2m]) * 100
sum by (pod) (process_resident_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*", pod="$pod"})
sum by (pod) (nodejs_heap_size_total_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*", pod="$pod"})
sum by (pod) (nodejs_heap_size_used_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"})
sum by (pod) (nodejs_external_memory_bytes{namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*", pod="$pod"})

panels.title: Misc (Eventloop latency, Used File Descriptors, Active Handlers)

targets.expr: nodejs_eventloop_lag_seconds{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"}
nodejs_eventloop_lag_p99_seconds{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"}
nodejs_eventloop_lag_p50_seconds{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"}
process_open_fds {pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"} / process_max_fds{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"}
nodejs_active_handles_total {pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", service=~"$app.*"}

title: Node JS + K8S Info
